price: እነዚያንም ከእናንተ ውስጥ በቅዳሜ ቀን (ዐሣን በማጥመድ) ወሰን ያለፉትንና ለነሱ «ወራዳዎች ስትኾኑ ዝንጀሮዎች ኹኑ» ያልናቸውን በእርግጥ ዐወቃችሁ፡፡
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱعۡتَدَوۡاْ مِنكُمۡ فِي ٱلسَّبۡتِ فَقُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُواْ قِرَدَةً خَٰسِـِٔينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'tumu alladhīna iʿ'tadaw minkum fī al-sabti faqul'nā lahum kūnū qiradatan khāsiīna
